describe: Belgium is a small, densely populated country in Western Europe, known for its medieval towns, Renaissance architecture, and as the headquarters of the European Union and NATO. It has distinctive regions including Dutch-speaking Flanders to the north, French-speaking Wallonia to the south, and a German-speaking community to the east.
